description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg: from n/a through 3.2.5.
